an5.195:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
an5.195:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattāni licchavisatāni bhagavantaṃ payirupāsanti.
an5.195:4.3: Appekacce licchavī nīlā honti nīlavaṇṇā nīlavatthā nīlālaṅkārā, appekacce licchavī pītā honti pītavaṇṇā pītavatthā pītālaṅkārā, appekacce licchavī lohitakā honti lohitakavaṇṇā lohitakavatthā lohitakālaṅkārā, appekacce licchavī odātā honti odātavaṇṇā odātavatthā odātālaṅkārā.
an5.195:4.4: Tyassudaṃ bhagavā atirocati vaṇṇena ceva yasasā ca.
an5.195:5.1: Atha kho piṅgiyānī brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.195:5.4: Atha kho piṅgiyānī brāhmaṇo bhagavato sammukhā sāruppāya gāthāya abhitthavi:
an5.195:6.1: “Padmaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ,
an5.195:7.1: Atha kho te licchavī pañcahi uttarāsaṅgasatehi piṅgiyāniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ acchādesuṃ.
an5.195:7.2: Atha kho piṅgiyānī brāhmaṇo tehi pañcahi uttarāsaṅgasatehi bhagavantaṃ acchādesi.
an5.195:8.1: Atha kho bhagavā te licchavī etadavoca:
an5.195:8.2: “* pañcannaṃ, licchavī, ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an5.195:8.4: Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an5.195:8.5: Tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an5.195:8.6: Tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an5.195:8.7: Tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno puggalo dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an5.195:8.9: Imesaṃ kho, licchavī, pañcannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
